translations: v.（用……）刺，戳；（拳击时用拳）猛击；猛踢（球）
n.戳，刺；<英，非正式>预防针，接种；<非正式>抨击，攻击；刺拳；刺痛的感觉（或感情）

sentences.sentence: Be careful! Don't jab his eye out with your bamboo pole.
sentences.translation: 小心！你的竹竿别捅了他的眼睛。

sentences.sentence: Don't worry if you aren't familiar with the JAB index, I just invented it!
sentences.translation: 如果您不熟悉 JAB 索引，请不要担心，这是我刚刚发明的！

sentences.sentence: More than 11 million people from groups deemed a "priority", are being offered the jab, alongside two million health and social care staff.
sentences.translation: 1100多万来自被认为是“重点”群体的人，以及200万卫生和社会护理人员正在接受注射。
